alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:49AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier and northwestern Hendry Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 248 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Big Corkscrew Island to near North Naples. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Golden Gate Estates, Port La Belle, Felda, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, North Naples, Vineyards, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Quail Creek Estate, and Lake Trafford. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
